official_title: A bill to amend the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to increase amounts available for expenditure from the Mass Transit Account of the Highway Trust Fund.

summary.text: Amends the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to provide that the amount available for expenditure from the Mass Transit Account of the Highway Trust Fund for FY 1985 through 1987 shall be the amount transferred or credited to such Account in the latest fiscal year for which data is available.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to increase amounts available for expenditure from the Mass Transit Account of the Highway Trust Fund.
